page.title: 08FASHION IN THE LANES
page.content: Most people in{Carlisle}shop in The {Lanes,}a new shopping development. It is a large complex based on old lanes which were demolished. The character of the old lanes has been retained to form a pleasant area for people to shop in. The shops are both big and small, ranging from large chain stores like C&A and Fine Fare to small units such as The Bird of Paradise, a flower shop. The importance of fashion today can be judged by the shops which devote a large proportion of their floor area to clothes. Skirts, jumpers or trousers can be made more fashionable by the addition of beads, bangles, earrings and bands.
